Handcrafted, home-made masterpieces

Premium Materials

Our bikes use the best quality aluminium which is sourced locally. This will increase the longevity of your purchase.

Fast Shipping

We make sure you recieve your bike as soon as we have finished making it. We also provide free returns if you are not satisfied.

Quality Assurance

For every purchase you make, we will ensure there are no damages or faults and we will check and test your bike.
